title: An Act relative to electronic defensive devices

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Garry of Dracut, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2615) of Colleen M. Garry relative to the defensive use of certain electronic devices.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
